title: World Championship's in the Cinema

embed.description: WATCH WORLDS ON THE BIG SCREEN! Have you ever wanted to experience Worlds with a live audience? At a viewing party, you'll join hundreds of League of Legends players at your local cinema in watching the 2015 World Championship on the big screen.

body:
Is there any plan for Riot to bring the world champs into any other cinema's? (Event Cinema). I'm in Cairns (QLD) and don't have a HOYTS Cinema here {{champion:32}} so I was wondering if there was a chance that Riot would ask any other cinemas rather than the ones in the main cities?

EDIT: I was doing some research and I found that Event Cinema dosakes with a seat capacity or 300-500 people. 

>https://www.eventcinemas.com.au/corporatesales

replies.body:
Hey man,
Have you checked out this page? - http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/worlds-viewingparties/
	
Also there are other big community run viewing parties being hosted you can find their details below

https://www.facebook.com/events/1629270504020888/
Botanic Bar
Level 3, P Block, 2 George St, Brisbane,

https://www.facebook.com/events/1664000963813506/
Schonell Cinema and Live Theatre
Union Road, University of Queensland, St Lucia, Brisbane

Also if there's nothing happening around you, maybe you can think about hosting your own viewing party? 
Register your event here, http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/ ,and we will work together to help support your event!
